snippet: There are strong opinions about whether to shoot video vertically or horizontally. Holding your phone the “wrong way” provokes both professional and amateur photographers.
abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column observes that while videos made by holding a smartphone vertically are looked down upon by many as amateurish, video consumers seem to prefer them; contends vertical video actually works better given the dimensions of a smartphone or tablet screen and tendency of users to hold the devices vertically.
lead_paragraph: There are strong opinions about whether to shoot video vertically or horizontally. Holding your phone the “wrong way” provokes both professional and amateur photographers.

headline.print_headline: Vertical Video? It Fits the Screen
headline.main: Vertical Video on the Small Screen? Not a Crime
